include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

list(APPEND j270sdr_sources
    J270SDRReceiver_impl.cc
    J270SDRTransmitter_impl.cc)

set(j270sdr_sources
    "${j270sdr_sources}"
    PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT j270sdr_sources)
    message(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT j270sdr_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-j270sdr SHARED ${j270sdr_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-j270sdr gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime)

find_package(J270SDR QUIET CONFIG)
if(J270SDR_FOUND)
    message(STATUS "Found external package J270SDR via CMake config")
    target_link_libraries(gnuradio-j270sdr J270SDR::J270SDR)
else()
    if(DEFINED ENV{J270SDR_ROOT})
        message(STATUS "Using J270SDR from $ENV{J270SDR_ROOT}")
        target_include_directories(gnuradio-j270sdr PRIVATE $ENV{J270SDR_ROOT}/include)
        if(WIN32)
            target_link_directories(gnuradio-j270sdr PRIVATE $ENV{J270SDR_ROOT}/lib)
        else()
            target_link_directories(gnuradio-j270sdr PRIVATE $ENV{J270SDR_ROOT}/lib $ENV{J270SDR_ROOT}/lib64)
        endif()
        target_link_libraries(gnuradio-j270sdr J270SDR)
    else()
        message(STATUS "External package J270SDR not linked (set J270SDR_ROOT or provide CMake config)")
    endif()
endif()

target_include_directories(
    gnuradio-j270sdr
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>)
set_target_properties(gnuradio-j270sdr PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_j270sdr_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
